hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
set -x
JAVA=/opt/java/bin/java
rm -f jenkins-cli.jar wget ${JENKINS_URL}/jnlpJars/jenkins-cli.jar
DEVICES=( 'jfltetmo' 'jfltexx' 'jfltecan' 'jflteatt' 'jfltespr' 'jfltevzw' 'jflteusc' )
PARAMS=( '-p' 'ROM=cyanogenmod' '-p' 'REPO_BRANCH=cm-10.2' '-p' 'RELEASE_TYPE=CM_EXPERIMENTAL' '-p' 'MAKECORES=DOUBLE' '-p' 'PUBLISH=true' '-p' 'UPDATE_TIMESTAMP=true' )
COUNTER=0 for device in ${DEVICES[@]}; do EXTRA_PARAMS=() #if [ "${COUNTER}" -eq 0 ]; then # EXTRA_PARAMS+=('-p' 'CLEAN=true') #else # EXTRA_PARAMS+=('-p' 'SYNC=false') #fi
# noobdev EXTRA_PARAMS+=('-p' 'CM_EXTRAVERSION=noobdev')
#case ${device} in #jflte*) # EXTRA_PARAMS+=('-p' 'CM_EXTRAVERSION=IR') # ;; #*) # ;; #esac
$JAVA -jar jenkins-cli.jar build Android ${PARAMS[@]} ${EXTRA_PARAMS[@]} -p LUNCH=${device}
let "COUNTER += 1" done
